abstract: WORD, in Greenpoint, Brooklyn, not only stocks books but also strives to create a community of people who love them.
snippet: WORD, in Greenpoint, Brooklyn, not only stocks books but also strives to create a community of people who love them.
lead_paragraph: Any bookstore can sell you a book. But if you're looking for a bookstore where you can find a date who shares your literary tastes, see a magic show, join a basketball league or have a cartoonist scrawl a tattoo on you with a permanent marker, the field narrows a bit.

headline.main: A Bookstore and a Hub for Readers
